    • Method Detail

      • createInputDataSet

        public static InputDataSet createInputDataSet(java.lang.String[] args)

      • getBestFittingInputDataSetType

        public static AbstractInputDataSet getBestFittingInputDataSetType(FileInputDataSet dataSet)
        Converts the given input data set to the most general class possible. If the given input data set is not associated to a file, a SimpleInputDataSet will be returned
        Parameters:
        dataSet - a FileInputDataSet which may not be associated to a file.
        Returns:
        an instance of AbstractInputDataSet

      • getBestFittingInputDataSetType

        public static AbstractInputDataSet getBestFittingInputDataSetType(SpatialIndexInputDataSet dataSet)
        Converts the given input data set to the most general class possible. That is, if the input data set only contains information from a file input data set instead of an index name, it will be returned and instance of FileInputFormat. If the given input data set does not contain a path or an index name, a SimpleInputDataSet will be returned
        Parameters:
        dataSet - a SpatialIndexInputDataSet which may not be a real spatial index
        Returns:
        an instance of AbstractInputDataSet

      • getInputDataSetLocations

        public static java.lang.String[] getInputDataSetLocations(AbstractInputDataSet dataSet)
        Gets the location(s) of the given input data set when the location is available. For MultiInputDataSet, the locations of all the contained input data sets are returned.
        Parameters:
        dataSet - an input data set
        Returns:
        an array of locations

      • getInputSplitForInputFormat

        public static InputSplit getInputSplitForInputFormat(java.lang.Class<<any>> infClass,
                                                     InputSplit split,
                                                     Configuration conf)
                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the type of InputSplit expected by the given InputFormat class
        Parameters:
        infClass - an InputFormat
        split - an InputSplit
        conf - a job's configuration
        Returns:
        an InputSplit adapted to the type expected to the given InputFormat when applicable
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • isFileInputFormat

        public static boolean isFileInputFormat(java.lang.Class<?> inputFormatClass)
        Utility method used to know if a given class is a subclass of FileInputFormat from wither, Hadoop old or new API
        Parameters:
        inputFormatClass - true if the given class is a subclass of FileInputFormat
        Returns:

      • loadInputDataSet

        public static <K,V> AbstractInputDataSet loadInputDataSet(Configuration conf)
                                                   throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                          java.lang.InstantiationException
        Loads an instance of AbstractInputDataSet stored in the configuration
        Parameters:
        conf - a job's configuration
        Returns:
        an instance of AbstractInputDataSet or null if no information was found
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.InstantiationException

      • loadInputDataSet

        public static <K,V> AbstractInputDataSet loadInputDataSet(java.lang.String tag,
                                                          Configuration conf)
        Loads an instance of AbstractInputDataSet stored in the configuration using the the given tag
        Parameters:
        tag - a prefix appended to the input data set if any
        conf - a job's configuration
        Returns:
        an instance of AbstractInputDataSet or null if no information was found

                                        Job job)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:

                                        JobConf jobConf)

        Throws:
